msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left and right hand sides. kollesis at the middle of col. 150. The column is badly damaged at the top and bottom; many lacunae at the middle and left hand sides. The right hand side, which has the end of the lines and payments is in a good condition. Some spots of salt on Verso. No restoration is needed. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated the new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the taxpayer. Dots of ink are on the Verso.

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
